header.author: Thomas Willis
header.title: Dr. Willis's RECEIPTS FOR THE CURE OF ALL DISTEMPERS: Together with an APPENDIX, Containing the General Forms of Prescription for Vomits, Purges, Diureticks, Sudorificks, Cordials, and Opiats. Collected out of the Writings of that Learned and Eminent Physician, and Faithfully Translated into English.
